definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: Special Envoy Cai Wu will attend relevant celebration activities.
sentences.chinese: 屆時蔡武特使將出席喀方有關慶祝活動。

sentences.english: Yellow to send envoy to macau and xuan of seven characters old meeting.
sentences.chinese: 黃以軒送特使去澳門與晏老會面。

sentences.english: He is the United Nations special envoy to Haiti.
The Afghan government attaches great importance to the visit of the special envoy of the Chinese government.
sentences.chinese: 阿政府高度重視中方派特使訪阿。

sentences.english: Ripken said he also hoped to visit other countries as the U.S. sports envoy.
sentences.chinese: 他還希望作爲美國體育特使訪問其他國家。

sentences.english: The last U.S.-Sudan envoy, Richard Williamson, stepped down at the end of the Bush administration.
sentences.chinese: 美國上一任蘇丹特使威廉姆森在布什政府下臺後離職。
北韓特使玄學鋒不贊同美國的立場。

sentences.english: The envoy said the United States is determined to get the peace process back on track.
sentences.chinese: 這位特使說，美國決心讓和平進程重上軌道。

sentences.english: The London Ambassadors programme is managed for the Mayor by the London Development Agency.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦特使計劃是由倫敦發展處爲市長運作的。

sentences.english: S. -Sudan envoy, Richard Williamson, stepped down at the end of the Bush administration.
sentences.chinese: 美國上一任蘇丹特使威廉姆森在布什政府下臺後離職。

sentences.english: In the case of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, she may need at least a half-dozen envoys.
sentences.chinese: 對於巴以衝突，她可能需要至少半打特使。

sentences.english: Yellow to porch accompanied with old meeting taking special envoy.
sentences.chinese: 黃以軒陪同特使與晏老會面。

sentences.english: The envoy made no suggestion that the US would seek a commitment from China to put a firm limit on its greenhouse gas emissions.
sentences.chinese: 特使沒有表明美國會要求中國承諾嚴限溫室氣體排放。

sentences.english: Forty visits by UN envoys have failed to elicit any change.
sentences.chinese: 四十二次聯合國特使的造訪沒有促成任何改變。

sentences.english: The Russian ambassador assured me we have no daylight between us.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯特使也向我保證，我們之間毫無芥蒂。

sentences.english: The three visits by the China's special envoy on the Middle Eastissue have produced good results.
sentences.chinese: 中國中東問題特使已三次出訪中東，取得了良好效果。

definition: Foreign Secretary/(UK) Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
to go abroad as ambassador/to be sent on a diplomatic mission
call in (one's subordinates)/summon (an envoy of a foreign country) to an interview
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
to receive sb/to grant an interview
